WorkItem.Description:
Hi all, 

Perhaps someone has a bright idea to help me. The error message as mentioned in the subject of this email suddenly appears in my solution, where it did not before.

What has changed is this: I have changed the project containing BusinessLogic (analog to the AdventureWorks.UILogic in the AW Reference application) to be a portable library and added a 8.1 Phone project to the solution. 

In the Windows 8.1 Views project (analog to the AdventureWorks.Shopper project) AS WELL AS in the Windows 8.1 Phone project I cannot get rid of the error.

I don't understand where exactly it is caused, and so I have no clue where to solve it.


P.S. It is not easy to provide a small demo-project, the size of my project is a couple of times bigger than the AdventureWorks reference application. If I would be able to isolate the problem to mimic it in a small project, i probably would be able to solve it completely. Sorry, but I cannot make it any mote attractive.

Is this enough information, or what would I need to provide more?

Anyone a good suggestion what I did wrong?
WorkItem.Summary: Why do I get this errormessage: 'Sub Main'was not found in 'AppName'

Comments.Message:
Laeve this! 
I reconstructed the solution, re-imported teh projects and made new references to the NuGet libs. 
That makes me face whole new challenges, but that is the subject of other discussions. See:
[this link](https://prismwindowsruntime.codeplex.com/discussions/581374) and [this one](https://prismwindowsruntime.codeplex.com/discussions/581039)
